title: oidc-client configuration exception Environment

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

Environment Variable wont work properly.

```
// Works in application.properties
quarkus.oidc-client.auth-server-url=<PathtoKeycloak>
// Wont work in .env
QUARKUS_OIDC_CLIENT_AUTH_SERVER_URL=<PathtoKeycloak>
```

### Expected behavior

Same behavior in `.env` and in `application.properties`

### Actual behavior


### How to Reproduce?

part pom.xml

```xml
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-resteasy-reactive</artifactId>
    </dependency>
<dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-oidc</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-oidc-client</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-oidc-client-reactive-filter</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-keycloak-authorization</artifactId>
    </dependency>
```

application.properties
```properties
# OIDC Configuration
quarkus.oidc.application-type=service
quarkus.oidc.tls.verification=none

quarkus.oidc.auth-server-url=http://keycloak:8080/auth/realms/quarkus
quarkus.oidc.token.issuer=https://quarkus.org/auth/realms/quarkus
quarkus.oidc.client-id=fancy-api

#OIDC Client
# Comment out the auth-server-url and activate it in the dotenv
quarkus.oidc-client.auth-server-url=http://keycloak:8080/auth/realms/quarkus
quarkus.oidc-client.client-id=fancy-api
quarkus.oidc-client.refresh-token-time-skew=5S
quarkus.oidc-client.tls.verification=none
```

.env
```dotenv
QUARKUS_OIDC_CLIENT_AUTH_SERVER_URL=http://keycloak:8080/auth/realms/quarkus
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.13" 2021-10-19 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment Microsoft-27990 (build 11.0.13+8-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Microsoft-27990 (build 11.0.13+8-LTS, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

quay.io/quarkus/ubi-quarkus-native-image:21.3.0-java11

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn 3.8.4

### Additional information

_No response_
